ComTask
          This task manages communications for the thermostat.
CoordinatorTask
          This TrjTask-like object coordinates the operation of the heater control and the cooler control.
SupervisorTask
          The Supervisor Task stores and returns setpoint information.
UserInterfaceTask
          The Task that implements the User Interface.
